Judul: WAREHOUSE PRODUCTIVITY IMPROVEMENT IN LAZADA FULFILLMENT CENTER
Abstrak:
Internet user have reached 100 milion people or about 40% of total population of Indonesia, make market of e-commerce into gold mine. This business itself rely on logistics support, without efficient, and smooth logistics system, the advantages of e-commerce would be diminished and warehousing is part of logistic that play an important role in e-commerce success nowadays. Warehouse/Fulfillment centers are up against incredible pressure and demand to meet customer expectation, they want the order to be fulfilled as fast as possible. In addition to maintaining customer satisfaction, warehouses operations are also required to increase the productivity of each employee in order to reduce operational costs. Currently the customer satisfaction represent as % Sameday shipped in KPI is approaching the target, but always sacrifices productivity in its achievement. The purpose of this research is to boost productivity while maintaining customer satisfaction. 

Six variables that affect warehouse productivity are Layout an slotting, Process, Visibility, Planning & Scheduling, Worker capabilites, and Technology. Based on the results of the analysis performed, there are 4 root problems found that currently make warehouse less productive such as lack traceability while using paper picking, inefficient slotting, bugs in WMS, inherent picking and packing process. 

From the problems that arose, there are several potential solutions which are: using 100% mobile device, do time study research and improve in picking and packing process, using picking conveyor, create heat map monitoring tools and work instruction, add bracket for handheld scanner or replace hand scanner with standing scanned. This potential solution is tested using an impact error matrix. The 3 solutions are not used because it requires a large investment, and not yet in accordance with the management strategy. 

The target of this research is to increase productivity, while maintaining customer satisfaction in this case sameday shipped.
Kata Kunci: e-commerce, logistik, fulfillment center, kpi, produktifitas, sameday shipped, time study
